verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5166>Nehemiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2446>Hacaliah.<s%> Now it happened in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3691>Chislev,<s%> in the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> as I was in <S%H7800>Shushan<s%> the <S%H1002>palace,<s%>

that <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> he and certain <S%H582>men<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and I <S%H7592>asked<s%> them concerning the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who had <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> who were <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity,<s%> and concerning <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7604>me,<s%> "The remnant who are <S%H7604>left<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> there in the <S%H4082>province<s%> are in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>affliction<s%> and <S%H2781>reproach.<s%> The <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> also is broken <S%H6555>down,<s%> and its <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H3341>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>"

It <S%H8085>happened,<s%> when I heard these <S%H1697>words,<s%> that I sat <S%H3427>down<s%> and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> certain <S%H3117>days;<s%> and I <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> with those who <S%H157>love<s%> him and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments:<s%>

Let your <S%H241>ear<s%> now be <S%H7183>attentive,<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> that you may <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> which I <S%H6419>pray<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you at this <S%H3117>time,<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> while I <S%H3034>confess<s%> the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H1>you.<s%> Yes, I and my father's <S%H1004>house<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

We have dealt <S%H2254>very<s%> <S%H2254>corruptly<s%> against <S%H8104>you,<s%> and have not kept the <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> nor the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> nor the <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> which you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H2142>"Remember,<s%> I beg <S%H1697>you,<s%> the word that you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4603><s%> 'If you trespass, I will scatter you <S%H6327>abroad<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%>

but if you <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H8104>me,<s%> and keep my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5080>them,<s%> though your outcasts were in the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> yet will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them from <S%H935>there,<s%> and will bring them to the <S%H4725>place<s%> that I have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> to cause my <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H7931>there.<s%>'

"Now these are your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> whom you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> by your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power,<s%> and by your <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H136>Lord,<s%> I <S%H577>beg<s%> <S%H241>you,<s%> let your ear be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> now to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and to the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who <S%H2655>delight<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> your <S%H8034>name;<s%> and please <S%H6743>prosper<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> him <S%H7356>mercy<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of this <S%H376>man.<s%>" Now I was cup <S%H8248>bearer<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
